definition: to visit/to call on/to seek/to inquire/to investigate

sentences.english: Paragraph 6: 2004 Revisit Planned for Collecting Lake Water Specimens.
sentences.chinese: 计划的2004年为提取湖水的重访。

sentences.english: It was a great satisfaction to have revisited our native village.
sentences.chinese: 重访家乡是非常愉快的事。

sentences.english: It feel strange to is visiting the place again after all these year.
sentences.chinese: 时隔多年，旧地重访使人感到很新奇。

sentences.english: The agency plans to revisit Tempel 1 on Feb. 14 of next year.
sentences.chinese: 当局计划明年2月14日重访坦普尔1号。

sentences.english: It feels strange to BE visiting the place again after all these years.
sentences.chinese: 时隔多年，旧地重访使人感到很新奇。

definition: to interview people on the spot/to go around and make inquiries
to collect local cultural material (recording folk songs, taking photos etc)
to visit/to call on/to seek/to inquire/to investigate
to revisit old haunts (idiom); down memory lane
to visit a place for the memories/to pay homage to (the deceased)
to recollect/to recall (past times)/to look back
see 追根溯源[zhui1 gen1 su4 yuan2]
